description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Our clients include global leaders in educational and financial services software, based in the United States. In addition we provide software engineering services worldwide.
              
              You will be responsible for the design, implementation, and resolution of technical challenges under the supervision of our highly experienced senior developers. Opportunities to enhance and expand your technical skills in varied areas are available from our experienced developers.
              
              Our projects are on-going, long term and may encompass other areas such as: banking, finance insurance and scientific applications
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering.
              
              - 2 Year experience highly desirable in Java/J2EE related areas, preferably in Spring MVC, SOA, JSON/XML, Hibernate, Spring Boot or NodeJS
              
              - Strong Java core, Object Oriented Programming (OOP)
              
              - Understand standard Unified Modeling Language (UML) and design
              
              - Understand Relational Database Management Systems (RDBMS), experience highly desirable.
              
              - Experience on Front-end development, strong knowledge in ReactJS, Flux, NodeJS is a plus.
              
              - Knowledge of Agile/ SCRUM
              
              - Experience on Android/iOS is a plus
              
              - Ability to produce clear, tight, concise, well documented code
              
              - Fluent in English, reading/writing/speaking.
              
              - Personality Requirements
              
              - Team oriented, work and communicate with other team members well.
              
              - Reliable, hard working, and responsible.
              
              - Strong interpersonal and communications skills.
              

              Company Benefit
              
              - High salary and friendly working environment
              
              - Have a 4*_standard _company_trip in summer
              
              - Working time is flexible, only required 8 hrs working-time continually at office.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
